resources.string: Looks like no Vidify devices are running on your network. If you don\'t know how to set one up, check out the Help section! This list is refreshed automatically.

You\'ll also need the desktop app Vidify installed on the computer where the music is playing. Both the computer with Vidify and the device with Vidify TV have to be in the same network. You can read more about how to install it in the GitHub website (via the QR code, or directly at https://github.com/vidify/vidify).
Subscribe to obtain full access to the app
To make it possible to continue Vidify\'s development, please subscribe. This will remove the demo version messages and will give you access to future extra features.
Use this QR code to share the app
You can also visit the Play Store page at http://bit.ly/vidifyapp, and check out the GitHub project at https://github.com/vidify/vidify
